description: Assumes no pg_stat_statements reset appeared in the selected time frame

styles.linkTooltip: Opens  'Single query details' dashboard for that queryid
Use 'edit' mode to be able to copy the query text

targets.query: SELECT top("spread", "queryid", "query", $top) FROM (SELECT spread("total_time") FROM "stat_statements" WHERE $timeFilter AND "dbname" = '$dbname' GROUP BY time(3650d), "queryid", "query" fill(none) ) WHERE spread > 0
targets.rawSql:
select
  tt as top,
  tt / calls as "Avg. runtime",
  calls as "Calls",
  100 * tt / (select sum(tt_agg) from (select tag_data->>'queryid', max((data->'total_time')::float) - min((data->'total_time')::float) as tt_agg from stat_statements where dbname = '$dbname' and  $__timeFilter(time) group by 1 having count(*) > 1) x) as approx_pct_db_total_time,
  queryid,
  (select data->>'users' from stat_statements where $__timeFilter(time) and dbname = '$dbname' and tag_data->>'queryid' = queryid order by time desc limit 1) as "Users",  
  case when length(query) > 250 then query::varchar(250) || '...' else query end as query
from (

  select
    tag_data->>'queryid' as queryid, tag_data->>'query' as query,
    max((data->>'total_time')::numeric) - min((data->>'total_time')::numeric) as tt,
    max((data->>'calls')::int8) - min((data->>'calls')::int8) as calls,
    min(time) as min_time,
    max(time) as max_time
  from stat_statements
    where dbname = '$dbname'
    and $__timeFilter(time)
    and case when '$hide_pgwatch_generated' = 'yes' then not tag_data->>'query' ~* E'\\(extract\\(\\$\\d+\\W*from\\W*now\\(\\)\\)\\W?\\*\\W*\\$\\d+\\).*::\\w+\\W+as\\W+epoch_ns\\W*,'
        and not tag_data->>'query' ~* E'/\\*\\W*pgwatch2_generated\\W*\\*/'  else true end
  group by
    1, 2

) x
where calls > 0 and tt > 0
order by 1 desc nulls last
limit $top

styles.linkTooltip: Opens  'Single query details' dashboard for that queryid
Use 'edit' mode to be able to copy the query text

targets.query: select top(avg, "queryid", "query", $top) AS top from (select mean(t) / mean(c) AS avg from (SELECT spread("total_time") AS t, spread("calls") AS c FROM "stat_statements" WHERE $timeFilter AND dbname = '$dbname' GROUP BY time(3650d), "queryid", "query" fill(none) )  where $timeFilter AND c > 0 group by time(3650d),  "queryid", "query" )
targets.rawSql:
select
  tt / calls as top,
  tt as "Total time",
  calls as "Calls",
  queryid,
  (select data->>'users' from stat_statements where $__timeFilter(time) and dbname = '$dbname' and tag_data->>'queryid' = queryid order by time desc limit 1) as "Users",
  case when length(query) > 200 then query::varchar(200) || '...' else query end as query
from (
  select
    tag_data->>'queryid' as queryid, tag_data->>'query' as query,
    max((data->>'total_time')::numeric) - min((data->>'total_time')::numeric) as tt,
    max((data->>'calls')::int8) - min((data->>'calls')::int8) as calls
  from stat_statements
    where dbname = '$dbname'
    and $__timeFilter(time)
    and case when '$hide_pgwatch_generated' = 'yes' then not tag_data->>'query' ~* E'\\(extract\\(\\$\\d+\\W*from\\W*now\\(\\)\\)\\W?\\*\\W*\\$\\d+\\).*::\\w+\\W+as\\W+epoch_ns\\W*,'
        and not tag_data->>'query' ~* E'/\\*\\W*pgwatch2_generated\\W*\\*/'  else true end
  group by
    1, 2
) x
where calls > 0 and tt > 0
order by 1 desc nulls last
limit $top

styles.linkTooltip: Opens  'Single query details' dashboard for that queryid
Use 'edit' mode to be able to copy the query text

targets.query: SELECT top("spread", "queryid", "query", $top) FROM (SELECT spread("calls") FROM "stat_statements" WHERE $timeFilter AND "dbname" = '$dbname' GROUP BY time(3650d), "queryid", "query" fill(none) ) WHERE spread > 0
targets.rawSql:
select
  calls as top,
  total_time as "Total time",
  total_time / calls as "Avg. runtime",
  queryid,
  (select data->>'users' from stat_statements where $__timeFilter(time) and dbname = '$dbname' and tag_data->>'queryid' = queryid order by time desc limit 1) as "Users",  
  case when length(query) > 200 then query::varchar(200) || '...' else query end as query
from (
  select
    tag_data->>'queryid' as queryid, tag_data->>'query' as query,
    max((data->>'calls')::int8) - min((data->>'calls')::int8) as calls,
    max((data->>'total_time')::numeric) - min((data->>'total_time')::numeric) as total_time
  from stat_statements
    where dbname = '$dbname'
    and $__timeFilter(time)
    and case when '$hide_pgwatch_generated' = 'yes' then not tag_data->>'query' ~* E'\\(extract\\(\\$\\d+\\W*from\\W*now\\(\\)\\)\\W?\\*\\W*\\$\\d+\\).*::\\w+\\W+as\\W+epoch_ns\\W*,'
        and not tag_data->>'query' ~* E'/\\*\\W*pgwatch2_generated\\W*\\*/'  else true end    
  group by
    1, 2
) x
where calls > 0
order by 1 desc nulls last
limit $top

styles.linkTooltip: Opens  'Single query details' dashboard for that queryid
Use 'edit' mode to be able to copy the query text

targets.query: SELECT top("spread", "queryid", "query", $top) FROM (SELECT spread("blk_read_time") + spread("blk_write_time") AS spread FROM "stat_statements" WHERE $timeFilter AND "dbname" = '$dbname' GROUP BY time(3650d), "queryid", "query" fill(none) ) WHERE spread > 0
targets.rawSql:
select
  (tt - wt - rt)::int8 as top,
  calls as "Calls",
  tt / calls as "Avg. runtime",
  queryid,
  (select data->>'users' from stat_statements where $__timeFilter(time) and dbname = '$dbname' and tag_data->>'queryid' = queryid order by time desc limit 1) as "Users",  
  case when length(query) > 200 then query::varchar(200) || '...' else query end as query
from (
  select
    tag_data->>'queryid' as queryid, tag_data->>'query' as query,
    max((data->>'total_time')::float8) - min((data->>'total_time')::float8) as tt,
    max((data->>'blk_read_time')::float8) - min((data->>'blk_read_time')::float8) as rt,
    max((data->>'blk_write_time')::float8) - min((data->>'blk_write_time')::float8) as wt,
    max((data->>'calls')::int8) - min((data->>'calls')::int8) as calls
  from stat_statements
    where dbname = '$dbname'
    and $__timeFilter(time)
    and case when '$hide_pgwatch_generated' = 'yes' then not tag_data->>'query' ~* E'\\(extract\\(\\$\\d+\\W*from\\W*now\\(\\)\\)\\W?\\*\\W*\\$\\d+\\).*::\\w+\\W+as\\W+epoch_ns\\W*,'
        and not tag_data->>'query' ~* E'/\\*\\W*pgwatch2_generated\\W*\\*/'  else true end    
   group by
     1, 2
) x
where tt - wt - rt > 0 and calls > 0
order by 1 desc nulls last
limit $top

panels.description: Does not include Shared Buffer activities. Same as 'By total runtime' if no direct IO was performed. Requires track_io_timing=on

styles.linkTooltip: Opens  'Single query details' dashboard for that queryid
Use 'edit' mode to be able to copy the query text

targets.query: SELECT top("spread", "queryid", "query", $top) FROM (SELECT spread("blk_read_time") + spread("blk_write_time") AS spread FROM "stat_statements" WHERE $timeFilter AND "dbname" = '$dbname' GROUP BY time(3650d), "queryid", "query" fill(none) ) WHERE spread > 0
targets.rawSql:
select
  wt + rt as top,
  tt as "Total time",
  queryid,
  (select data->>'users' from stat_statements where $__timeFilter(time) and dbname = '$dbname' and tag_data->>'queryid' = queryid order by time desc limit 1) as "Users",  
  case when length(query) > 200 then query::varchar(200) || '...' else query end as query
from (
  select
    tag_data->>'queryid' as queryid, max(tag_data->>'query') as query,
    max((data->>'blk_read_time')::float8) - min((data->>'blk_read_time')::float8) as rt,
    max((data->>'blk_write_time')::float8) - min((data->>'blk_write_time')::float8) as wt,
    max((data->>'total_time')::float8) - min((data->>'total_time')::float8) as tt
  from stat_statements
    where dbname = '$dbname'
    and $__timeFilter(time)
    and case when '$hide_pgwatch_generated' = 'yes' then not tag_data->>'query' ~* E'\\(extract\\(\\$\\d+\\W*from\\W*now\\(\\)\\)\\W?\\*\\W*\\$\\d+\\).*::\\w+\\W+as\\W+epoch_ns\\W*,'
        and not tag_data->>'query' ~* E'/\\*\\W*pgwatch2_generated\\W*\\*/'  else true end    
  group by
    1
) x
where rt + wt > 0.1
order by 1 desc nulls last
limit $top

panels.title: Top queries by direct (backend) IO

panels.description: Shared buffer + temp buffer reading / writing

styles.linkTooltip: Opens  'Single query details' dashboard for that queryid
Use 'edit' mode to be able to copy the query text

targets.query: SELECT top("spread", "queryid", "query", $top) FROM (SELECT spread("blk_read_time") + spread("blk_write_time") AS spread FROM "stat_statements" WHERE $timeFilter AND "dbname" = '$dbname' GROUP BY time(3650d), "queryid", "query" fill(none) ) WHERE spread > 0
targets.rawSql:
select
  (shared_blks_hit + shared_blks_read + shared_blks_dirtied + shared_blks_written)*8192 /*assuming default 8k block size*/ as top,
  (shared_blks_hit + shared_blks_read + shared_blks_dirtied + shared_blks_written)*8192 / calls as "Per call",
  calls as "Calls",
  total_time / calls as "Avg. runtime",
  queryid,
  (select data->>'users' from stat_statements where $__timeFilter(time) and dbname = '$dbname' and tag_data->>'queryid' = queryid order by time desc limit 1) as "Users",  
  case when length(query) > 200 then query::varchar(200) || '...' else query end as query
from (
  select
    tag_data->>'queryid' as queryid,
    tag_data->>'query' as query,
    max((data->>'shared_blks_hit')::int8) - min((data->>'shared_blks_hit')::int8) as shared_blks_hit,
    max((data->>'shared_blks_read')::int8) - min((data->>'shared_blks_read')::int8) as shared_blks_read,
    max((data->>'shared_blks_dirtied')::int8) - min((data->>'shared_blks_dirtied')::int8) as shared_blks_dirtied,
    max((data->>'shared_blks_written')::int8) - min((data->>'shared_blks_written')::int8) as shared_blks_written,
    max((data->>'calls')::int8) - min((data->>'calls')::int8) as calls,
    max((data->>'total_time')::float) - min((data->>'total_time')::float) as total_time
  from stat_statements
    where dbname = '$dbname'
    and $__timeFilter(time)
    and case when '$hide_pgwatch_generated' = 'yes' then not tag_data->>'query' ~* E'\\(extract\\(\\$\\d+\\W*from\\W*now\\(\\)\\)\\W?\\*\\W*\\$\\d+\\).*::\\w+\\W+as\\W+epoch_ns\\W*,'
        and not tag_data->>'query' ~* E'/\\*\\W*pgwatch2_generated\\W*\\*/'  else true end
  group by
    1, 2
) x
where calls > 0
order by 1 desc nulls last
limit  $top

panels.title: Top by block bandwith (assuming 8K blocks)

styles.linkTooltip: Opens  'Single query details' dashboard for that queryid
Use 'edit' mode to be able to copy the query text

targets.query: SELECT top("spread", "queryid", "query", $top) FROM (SELECT spread("blk_read_time") + spread("blk_write_time") AS spread FROM "stat_statements" WHERE $timeFilter AND "dbname" = '$dbname' GROUP BY time(3650d), "queryid", "query" fill(none) ) WHERE spread > 0
targets.rawSql:
select
  temp_blks_written * 8192 /*assuming default 8k block size*/ as top,
  (temp_blks_read * 8192) / calls as "Temp blocks read",
  total_time as "Total runtime",
  calls as "Calls",
  total_time / calls as "Avg. runtime",
  queryid,
  (select data->>'users' from stat_statements where $__timeFilter(time) and dbname = '$dbname' and tag_data->>'queryid' = queryid order by time desc limit 1) as "Users",  
  case when length(query) > 200 then query::varchar(200) || '...' else query end as query
from (
  select
    tag_data->>'queryid' as queryid,
    tag_data->>'query' as query,
    max((data->>'temp_blks_read')::int8) - min((data->>'temp_blks_read')::int8) as temp_blks_read,
    max((data->>'temp_blks_written')::int8) - min((data->>'temp_blks_written')::int8) as temp_blks_written,
    max((data->>'calls')::int8) - min((data->>'calls')::int8) as calls,
    max((data->>'total_time')::float) - min((data->>'total_time')::float) as total_time
  from stat_statements
    where dbname = '$dbname'
    and $__timeFilter(time)
    and case when '$hide_pgwatch_generated' = 'yes' then not tag_data->>'query' ~* E'\\(extract\\(\\$\\d+\\W*from\\W*now\\(\\)\\)\\W?\\*\\W*\\$\\d+\\).*::\\w+\\W+as\\W+epoch_ns\\W*,'
        and not tag_data->>'query' ~* E'/\\*\\W*pgwatch2_generated\\W*\\*/'  else true end
  group by
    1, 2
) x
where temp_blks_written > 0
order by 1 desc nulls last
limit  $top

panels.content: Brought to you by:

targets.rawSql:
select
0 as time,
coalesce ((

select 1 from (
select
  (data->'xact_commit')::int8 as xact_commit,
  lag((data->'xact_commit')::int8) over (order by time) as xact_commit_lag
from
  db_stats
where
  $__timeFilter(time)
  and dbname = '$dbname'
) x
where xact_commit_lag > xact_commit
limit 1

), 0) as was_reset

valueMaps.text: WARNING: global stats reset detected for selected time range, results are unreliable - use the slower "Stat Statements Top" dashboard

list.name: dbname
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT dbname FROM admin.all_distinct_dbname_metrics WHERE metric = 'stat_statements' ORDER BY 1;

title: Stat statements Top (Fast)
